website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for those who are big believers in the benefits of green tea.
pros: This mud mask works particularly well for exfoliating as well as anti-aging
Antioxidants leave skin feeling and looking refreshed and youthful
cons: Not as strong for clearing out clogged pores as other masks on this list

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mask for over a year. I initially got a sample from a monthly box subscription and loved it. It's honestly one of the best out there in my opinion and I am a beauty product conesouir. Try it twice a week. The results are amazing!
customer_reviews.author: KRISTINA KEEGAN

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Wow! Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Leaves my skin looking and feeling AMAZING!! My 13 yr old daughter loves it too. It’s gentle, feels amazing, I will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Kristanne

customer_reviews.title: Great for rednessa
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have sensitive skin that gets red easily. I tried doing “random” face masks that came in my fab fit fun box and realized I can’t do random skincare products. I googled and found a list of good skincare for redness and it said this face mask so I bought it on a whim and it’s great for sensitive skin/redness
customer_reviews.author: amanda cc

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: My face is extremely difficult to maintain. Let me say that first. I read the reviews on this product and was pretty stoked. The first time I used this product I gave it the benefit of the doubt. I read that it wasn’t firm once applied and felt great on your skin. False, it’s just like the Australian pink clay face masks. It is tight and uncomfortable. Not just that but it has made no difference to my skin. Yes I have used the entire thing, so I gave it a chance. I’m sticking to Lira and anyone with stubborn skin should do the same!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Keener

customer_reviews.title: Calming and Smoothing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product because I’ve been really having skin trouble. I have really bad rosacea that actually create bumpy areas of my skin. My skin gets very inflamed on a regular basis. I’ve used this mask 3 times and can already see a difference! My redness has minimized and my skin looks smoother and tighter, not as swollen. Because of my sensitive skin I was a little concerned but this product does not irritate my skin in any way. I’m almost emotional about it because my skin was really starting to do a number on my self esteem. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: gabriella

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: I love the standard green mask. Didn’t help with any redness like I saw in other reviews. Sad about that.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love it and it smells neutral which means it’s more focused on the result versus the fragrance. That means a lot to me as a consumer!
customer_reviews.author: Gabs

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Same as just like in stores. Not to much of a. Scent. Perfect for sensitive skin. Great smell. I use after my shower and before I use my regular boscia charcoal cleanse.I leave the mask on for about 20-25 minutes. Once dry I’ll use cotton pads and Luke warm water to rinse off.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D

customer_reviews.title: PACKAGING
customer_reviews.text: This product is FANTASTIC! I have rosacea and sensitive skin this cools my face, it works. The box was mangled and the container was not sealed, hmmm. When opening the container it looked like someone took a scoop and scrape in the container, it wasn't full or nicely smooth out. I was hesitant to use it at this point I need to calm my rosacea so I used it. Everything was fine. But I may not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: What not
customer_reviews.text: Could be a good product but I got mine it was open and all dried out witch makes it worthless! Stuff happens I know but packing things like this needs more attention !!!
customer_reviews.author: Hajnalka G.

customer_reviews.title: Reimbursement
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this last week and it’s on special for $29.69. I bought it for $38. It was literally a day or 2 after I bought that it went on special. Can you honor the new special price and reimburse me the difference?
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: It was too thick to apply even with a spactula to the point I don’t want to use it
customer_reviews.author: Aj nichele

customer_reviews.title: So SMOOOTH!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely face mask. I really love it. It comes in a small jar with a wide opening. The clay is so rich, smooth and feels amazing on the skin. It dries to a light powdery texture that is easy to rinse off and wipe with a cloth. It just smells like a clay face mask to me, not chemically at all. This leaves my skin feeling so smooth and calm. I only use masks about once a month because I have very delicate skin, and more sensitive during winter months. I love this mask and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: The Modernist Medium

customer_reviews.title: Cleansing and calming
customer_reviews.text: I love how clean and smooth my skin feels after using this mask. I got it mostly because I was interested in the matcha aspect of it. It goes on easy and has a nice cooling effect on my face that is greatly needed after a hard day. It takes about 15 full minutes for the mask to dry/harden, but it's not uncomfortable like a lot of other products are. It's easy to wash off and doesn't take a whole lot of mess or effort. Afterwards my face feels smooth and clean, not tight at all. This is a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: OA

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, even for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: boscia Matcha Magic Super-Antioxidant Mask can be used on all skin types. I have super dry skin and this mask felt wonderful and I really think that it helped reduce the pores on my nose and evened out my skin tone a bit. I applied the mask with a synthetic mask brush in a very thin layer. I didn't apply this around my eyes but only in areas where I have issues. I washed this off using my Make Up Eraser cloth with warm water. It really made my skin feel great. I followed it up immediately with a super hydrating serum and then my regular cream.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Want a facial at home? This is a good starting place. It seems like a quality product. No preservatives. No weird smells. It has a very smooth and creamy consistency. It goes on easily. Silky smooth. I felt a slight tingling and tightening as the mask dried. A very pleasant experience. The mask wiped off easily with a wash cloth and warm water. Afterwards, the facial pores seemed much smaller and the facial skin had a very soft and smooth feel. A very pleasant, pampering experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tell It Like It Is

customer_reviews.title: A lovely masque that makes my skin feel good
customer_reviews.text: I use some kind if masque every morning while I am doing my TENS treatment on my feet, so I have a lot to compare to. This is one of my favorites. It is a mud masque that tightens the pores, providing antioxidants to clarify the skin. Leave it on 15-20 minutes. The green matcha tea smell is lovely. I don't do a mud masque every day as they can be drying, but I do use them 2-3 times a week, with collagen and herbal sheet masques in between. Great stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Herblady22

customer_reviews.title: Rich, creamy mask, leaves skin feeling smooth and clean
customer_reviews.text: This is a rich, thick, creamy mask. It is easily applied with the included spatula. It felt cool at first but after a few minutes began to dry and tighten. After 15 to 20 minutes it was time to rinse it off. I found that the easiest way to remove the mask was in the shower. I let the warm water pour over my face and it melted away. My skin felt smooth and clean. I could feel the difference all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, relaxing
customer_reviews.text: First, I love that this has no smell. It's extremely gentle, perfect for my sensitive skin. It's very very creamy and goes on so smoothly. After applying it feels cool until it is totally dry. You will feel a little tingly feeling, but I have always felt that with any mask I've used. Face felt wonderful after taking it off! Nice and firm. I love using this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lac

customer_reviews.title: natural face mask that works
customer_reviews.text: This face mask is natural and unscented. love it! It went on really nicely. You just need a small amount. You can always add more if you need. The mask didn't burn or anything. It had a cooling sensation on my face. When I took it off, my face was really moisturized, glowing and my skin was soft. Great product for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: 💚TosaTat💚

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. It goes on light drawing out all of the impurities. There is no itching or pain associated with this mask as some masks start to cause me to itch when it's drying. This one doesn't do that. It washes off cleanly and gives me a nice refreshing glow.
customer_reviews.author: K Dude

customer_reviews.title: A cleansing mask ideal for those prone to break-outs or with naturally oily skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is a product that anyone can use. This special anti-oxidant mask from Boscia goes on smoothly with a pleasant scent. The properties allow for a deep cleaning of facial pores that is ideal for those prone to break-outs or with naturally oily skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ray J. Palen Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Five minute mask
customer_reviews.text: The mask has cleansing properties without drying up skin. Five minutes works fine for me, much less than the recommended 15 to 20 minutes in the labels. It's quite hard to rinse off - I use it in the shower. So far I trust this product because it is made in USA.
customer_reviews.author: Pikmin

customer_reviews.title: Smells nice!
customer_reviews.text: This matcha mask felt wonderful and it smells good. I don't know how my skin should feel after rinsing this off, but it feels a bit dry. Clean, but dry. I'll try it again in a few days and see if it's the best match for my skin type.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Alberigi McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Soothing and luxurious.
customer_reviews.text: Very luxurious! This isn't drying at all, like many masks are. After using it my skin feels so soothed, smooth and refreshed. This one is a new favorite and I love how my face feels after using it. Very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Where the Sidewalk Ends

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask.
customer_reviews.text: The mask smells good. I like the ingredients and cooling effect. I am not sure if my face was less irritated after, I think actually sin felt more invigorated. The mask dries out but it is not uncomfortable like some clay mask I've tried in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Bigslacker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so excited to have this product! So very happy. It feels so nice and moisturizing. I can feel a difference just from using it once.
customer_reviews.author: Matt and Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Unimpressed
customer_reviews.text: It didn't really feel much like a mask at all. Much more like a cleansing scrub. Overall I was not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Lee

product_meta.title: boscia MATCHA - Vegan, Cruelty-Free, Natural and Clean Skincare | A magic Super-Antioxidant Mask, Detoxifying and Brightening Matcha Green Tea Facial Mask
product_meta.description:
Style:New PackagingDetoxify, decongest and de-stress your skin with the antioxidant power of Matcha Green Tea. This antioxidant magic-maker feeds your skin a multitude of health benefits including reducing redness and inflammation caused by environmental free radical damage.

BRAND STORY
Plants are the secret to our skincare success. We're revolutionizing clean beauty routines around the world with products that are made for play and meant to be shared. Trust us, your skin wants in on the fun.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
